text: Meghasangeetham is a 1996 Indian Malayalam film directed by Ajayan Thoppil Bhasi and starring Murali and Sreelekshmi in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Vijayaraghavan * Renuka (Prashanthi) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Meghasangeetham
